sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; class App extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { f1Complete: false, f2Complete: false, f3Complete: false, name: null, email: null, password: null, address_line_1: null, address_line_2: null, city: null, state: null, zip_code: null, card_number: null, expiration: null, cvv: null, billing_zip: null } } onFormSubmit = (state) => { console.log(state); } checkCurrentState = () => { console.log(this.state); } handleInputChange = (event) => { var stateId = event.target.id; var stateValue = event.target.value; this.setState({ [stateId]: stateValue }); } onbuttonClick = (event) => { var step = event.target.id event.preventDefault(); this.setState({ [step]: true }); this.onFormSubmit(this.state); } render() { var f1Complete = (this.state.f1Complete && !this.state.form2Complete && !this.state.f3Complete); var f2Complete = (this.state.f2Complete && this.state.form1Complete && !this.state.f3Complete); var f3Complete = (this.state.f2Complete && this.state.form1Complete && this.state.f3Complete); if (!f1Complete) { return ( <>
